toepiece, first of all you need to have a 'hacked' psp, which is fairly easy if you take it slow, search the web for how to do it,and be careful, otherwise you'll brick it, if you already have a PSP that can use ISO's simplest way is to connect PSPcomputer by USB cable and put the ISO in the right folder.
Good Luck
Riverdude In got a hacked psp, but in what folder do i put the files i download and do i need ro rename them ???? please help me >< add my msn (vasterviks-kebabman@hotmail.com)

Guys, go here and download UmdGen,
It converts the iso's to .cso, the compressed files you can put directly onto your memorystick to play the games from the memorystick. 
UmdGen here: http://www.psp-hacks.com/file/194
I extracted the first .rar from this torrent to a seperate folder and then opened it in UmdGen, then saved as .cso and it worked perfectly.
Best of luck with it, I think the original uploader could have given a heads up on how to convert the files tbh.
